attributes.action: Ensure that there is investment in the UK coal mining industry to keep open current mines and develop future mines before we become reliant on energy sources from unstable foreign countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are 5 large coal mines remaining in the UK. We import more coal than we produce. Very soon we will be reliant on countries such as Russia, Columbia, China etc for our energy supplies. We leave ourselves open to the same chaos seen in the 70's with oil prices. We need to act now before we are too late.
